fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Culture and media, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Education and training, Business and Industry, Environment, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Communication
eu_initiatives: Community of Practice for Better Co- and Self-regulation, UCPD, MCAD, AVMSD, Data Privacy, Consumer Protection, CPC Regulation, Alcohol and Health Forum, The EU Platform for Action on Diet, Physical Activity and Health, Data Protection, Cosmetics, Gender Stereotyping
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: EASA is member of the ICC Belgium (International Chamber of Commerce Belgium)
goals__remit: The European Advertising Standards Alliance (EASA) is the single authoritative voice on advertising self-regulation issues and promotes high ethical standards in commercial communications by means of effective self-regulation. As a non-profit organisation based in Brussels, it brings together national advertising self-regulatory organisations (SROs) and organisations representing the advertising industry in Europe and beyond.
relevant_communication: Involved on files concerning advertising and self-regulatory initiatives. Recently part of the Multistakeholder Forum on Disinformation and co-drafter of the Code of Practice on Disinformation.
